# SSE Documentation

Old TypeScript/Next.js documentation deleted (2025-12-29) - it documented an implementation that doesn't exist.

## Actual SSE Implementation

Python/FastAPI in `runtime/infrastructure/api/`:
- `sse_broadcast.py`
- `moments.py`

## Event Types

- `moment_activated`
- `moment_completed`
- `moment_decayed`
- `weight_updated`
- `click_traversed`
